name: For Fame
description:

Knight Tournament?

We were inspired by one game, and we are trying to implement our own version.
You can see what we do.
Sorry for the graphics, our artist is just learning, we will try to tighten the graphics in the next updates.
As well as the mechanics, we want to rework it almost from scratch. I think it will be cool)
 
We try, we still can't do a lot
